pro/phase-3.title: EmotionDeck PRO — Phase 3: Young Adults | Advanced Emotion Perception Study
pro/phase-3.description: Explore EmotionDeck PRO Phase 3: Young Adults — 96 ultra-realistic black and white portraits capturing authentic emotional expressions of people in their early twenties. Designed for advanced study, education, and emotional perception research.
pro/phase-3.keywords: EmotionDeck, Young Adults, human emotions, emotion recognition, visual dataset, emotional intelligence, psychology research, empathy study, black and white portraits, realistic faces, emotion learning, professional training
pro/phase-3.og_description: Discover 96 detailed portraits of young adults expressing nuanced human emotions. EmotionDeck PRO Phase 3 expands emotional perception research with realistic imagery for education and professional use.

pro/phase-4.title: EmotionDeck PRO — Phase 4: Children Collection | Emotional Development and Educational Study
pro/phase-4.description: Explore EmotionDeck PRO Phase 4: Children Collection — 84 ultra-realistic black-and-white portraits capturing authentic emotional expressions of children aged around 6–7 years. Designed for educational and psychological illustration, supporting emotion recognition, empathy, and early emotional development research.
pro/phase-4.keywords: EmotionDeck, Children Collection, child emotions, emotional development, child psychology, empathy learning, visual dataset, emotion recognition, educational resource, black-and-white portraits, psychology research, emotional intelligence, empathy education
pro/phase-4.og_description: Discover 84 detailed black-and-white portraits of children aged 6–7 expressing authentic emotions. EmotionDeck PRO Phase 4 extends emotional perception research into early childhood education and empathy training.
pro/phase-4.twitter_description: EmotionDeck PRO Phase 4 presents 84 high-resolution portraits of children expressing core human emotions for education, psychology, and empathy development.

pro/phase-5.title: EmotionDeck PRO — Phase 5: Seniors Collection | Wisdom, Emotion, and the Human Experience
pro/phase-5.description: Explore EmotionDeck PRO Phase 5: Seniors Collection — 300 ultra-realistic black-and-white portraits capturing the emotional richness and wisdom of older adults. A professional visual dataset designed for emotional research, empathy training, and cross-generational understanding.

pro/phase-5.og_description: Discover 300 detailed black-and-white portraits of seniors expressing 50 core emotions. EmotionDeck PRO Phase 5 explores emotional resilience, reflection, and wisdom through authentic human expression.
pro/phase-5.twitter_description: EmotionDeck PRO Phase 5 presents 300 portraits of seniors expressing wisdom, calmness, and emotional depth — expanding emotional research and empathy through visual psychology.

pro/phase-6.title: EmotionDeck PRO — Phase 6: Evolution | One World, Many Feelings
pro/phase-6.description: Explore EmotionDeck PRO Phase 6: Evolution — a global emotional atlas portraying the evolution of human feelings across cultures, ages, and genders. Featuring over 300 ultra-realistic black-and-white portraits capturing the universality and diversity of emotion.

learn.title: EmotionDeck Learn & Grow — Discover the Science of Emotion
learn.description: Explore the Learn & Grow section of EmotionDeck — where psychology meets AI. Take emotion recognition quizzes, analyse facial expressions with FACS, and reflect with the Live Emotion Mirror to deepen your emotional understanding.
learn.keywords: EmotionDeck learn, emotion learning, psychology and AI, emotion quizzes, facial expression analysis, FACS, emotion science, emotional intelligence, emotion mirror, emotion recognition, cultural emotions
learn.og_title: EmotionDeck Learn & Grow — Discover the Science of Emotion
learn.og_description: Enhance your emotional intelligence with EmotionDeck’s Learn & Grow modules — quizzes, FACS analyser, and AI-powered Emotion Mirror.
learn.twitter_title: EmotionDeck Learn & Grow — Discover the Science of Emotion
learn.twitter_description: Learn to recognise and understand emotions through quizzes, FACS analysis, and the Emotion Mirror — only on EmotionDeck.

learn/facs.title: EmotionDeck Learn & Grow — FACS Emotion Analyzer
learn/facs.description: Explore the Facial Action Coding System (FACS) with EmotionDeck. Learn how facial muscles express emotions in real time and understand the science behind every smile, frown, and microexpression.
learn/facs.keywords: EmotionDeck FACS, Facial Action Coding System, emotion analysis, real-time emotion recognition, facial expressions, psychology and AI, emotional intelligence, emotion science, microexpressions, emotion learning
learn/facs.og_title: EmotionDeck Learn & Grow — FACS Emotion Analyzer
learn/facs.og_description: Discover the science of human emotion through FACS — analyse real-time facial expressions and learn how emotions shape the human face.
learn/facs.twitter_title: EmotionDeck Learn & Grow — FACS Emotion Analyzer
learn/facs.twitter_description: Learn how facial muscles express emotions using the Facial Action Coding System — only on EmotionDeck Learn & Grow.

learn/quizzes.title: EmotionDeck Learn & Grow — Emotion Recognition Quizzes
learn/quizzes.description: Test your emotional intelligence with EmotionDeck’s interactive quizzes. Identify emotions from AI-generated portraits and explore how expressions differ across cultures in the Free Basic Collection.
learn/quizzes.keywords: EmotionDeck quizzes, emotion recognition, emotion learning, psychology and AI, emotional intelligence, emotion training, Free Basic Collection, emotion science, empathy, facial expression quiz, cultural emotions
learn/quizzes.og_title: EmotionDeck Learn & Grow — Emotion Recognition Quizzes
learn/quizzes.og_description: Sharpen your emotional perception with EmotionDeck quizzes. Recognise emotions in portraits and discover how feelings connect across humanity.
learn/quizzes.twitter_title: EmotionDeck Learn & Grow — Emotion Recognition Quizzes
learn/quizzes.twitter_description: Challenge yourself with EmotionDeck’s emotion recognition quizzes. Test your ability to read emotions through AI-generated portraits.

learn/quizzes/quiz-1.title: EmotionDeck Quiz 1 — Recognise the Emotion (Phase 1)
learn/quizzes/quiz-1.description: Test your ability to recognise human emotions through AI-generated portraits from the EmotionDeck Free Basic Collection. Each round presents real emotional expressions from diverse cultures — see how accurately you can identify them.
learn/quizzes/quiz-1.keywords: EmotionDeck quiz, emotion recognition test, emotion learning, emotional intelligence, AI portraits, Free Basic Collection, emotion science, facial expression quiz, empathy training, cross-cultural emotions, psychology and AI
learn/quizzes/quiz-1.og_description: Identify emotions in AI-generated portraits and test your emotional insight with the first EmotionDeck Quiz. Challenge your ability to read emotions across cultures.
learn/quizzes/quiz-1.twitter_description: Discover how well you can recognise emotions in AI-generated portraits. Try the first EmotionDeck Quiz and explore human emotion through visual intelligence.

learn/quizzes/quiz-2.title: EmotionDeck Quiz 2 — Recognise the Emotion (Phase 2)
learn/quizzes/quiz-2.description: Test your emotional intuition with EmotionDeck Quiz 2. Identify advanced emotions such as Anxiety, Nostalgia, Confidence, and Tranquillity across different ages and cultures. Explore subtle human expressions from the EmotionDeck Phase 2 — Advanced Emotional Expressions Collection.
learn/quizzes/quiz-2.keywords: EmotionDeck quiz, emotion recognition test, emotional intelligence, advanced emotions, cultural psychology, empathy training, human expressions, Anxiety, Nostalgia, Confidence, Tranquillity, psychology and AI
learn/quizzes/quiz-2.og_description: Challenge your perception with the EmotionDeck Phase 2 Quiz. Recognise complex emotions across cultures and refine your emotional awareness.
learn/quizzes/quiz-2.twitter_description: Explore subtle emotional expressions in the EmotionDeck Phase 2 Quiz. Identify advanced emotions like Nostalgia, Confidence, and Tranquillity.

learn/quizzes/quiz-3.title: EmotionDeck Quiz 3 — Recognise the Emotion (Young Adults - Phase 3)
learn/quizzes/quiz-3.description: Test your ability to recognise emotions through realistic black and white portraits of young adults from different regions. Identify core emotions like Joy, Anger, Fear, and Curiosity. Continue your journey in emotional intelligence with EmotionDeck Learn.
learn/quizzes/quiz-3.keywords: EmotionDeck quiz, emotion recognition, young adults, facial expressions, empathy training, psychology, emotion test, human behaviour, cultural emotions
learn/quizzes/quiz-3.og_title: EmotionDeck Quiz 3 — Recognise the Emotion (Young Adults - Phase 3)
learn/quizzes/quiz-3.og_description: Explore how well you can identify emotions across diverse faces of young adults. Try the next challenge in the EmotionDeck Learn series.
learn/quizzes/quiz-3.twitter_title: EmotionDeck Quiz 3 — Recognise the Emotion (Young Adults - Phase 3)
learn/quizzes/quiz-3.twitter_description: Continue your emotional recognition journey with black and white portraits of young adults. Identify core emotions with EmotionDeck Learn.

learn/quizzes/quiz-4.title: EmotionDeck Quiz 4 — Global Emotional Spectrum
learn/quizzes/quiz-4.description: Discover the full range of human emotion through 120 black and white portraits across 10 global categories. Train your emotional intelligence with realistic faces representing diverse ages, genders, and cultures. Explore the emotional spectrum of humanity with EmotionDeck Learn.
learn/quizzes/quiz-4.keywords: EmotionDeck quiz, global emotional spectrum, emotion recognition, cultural emotions, psychology, empathy training, emotional intelligence, black and white portraits, learning emotions, human behaviour
learn/quizzes/quiz-4.og_description: Experience 120 emotions across 10 categories in the most comprehensive EmotionDeck quiz yet. Recognise emotions from realistic portraits of people from all around the world.
learn/quizzes/quiz-4.twitter_description: Recognise 120 emotions across 10 global categories. The ultimate EmotionDeck training experience for emotional perception and cultural awareness.

globalmap.title: EmotionDeck Global Map — One World, Many Emotions
globalmap.description:
Explore the EmotionDeck Global Map — an interactive emotional atlas that visualises how
different cultures express, perceive, and interpret human emotions. Click on any country
to uncover emotional insights, cultural influences, and shared human experiences
across the world.
globalmap.keywords:
EmotionDeck Global Map, emotional atlas, emotion across cultures, cultural psychology,
facial expression diversity, empathy training, emotion research, global emotion study,
interactive emotion map, cultural differences, emotion perception, psychology education
globalmap.og_title: EmotionDeck Global Map — One World, Many Emotions
globalmap.og_description:
Discover how human emotions vary and connect across cultures with the interactive
EmotionDeck Global Map — an educational exploration of emotional diversity worldwide.
globalmap.twitter_title: EmotionDeck Global Map — One World, Many Emotions
globalmap.twitter_description:
Explore the interactive EmotionDeck Global Map and uncover how culture shapes emotion,
expression, and empathy around the world.
